page.title: 12Grampound Rd Hall and Field
page.content: The Playing Field and the Hall are both 50 years old. The Playing Field has a Cricket Pavilion and play area with swings,a slide and a sandpit. Both the Hall and the Field are in the centre of Grampound Road. The Playing Field is owned by the National Playing Field Association and run by the Trustees and the Committee. The Hall is owned and run by Trustees and a Committee. The Hall is used by the school for its plays and for P.E but discos and dances are also held in it. The playgroup meet for 3 mornings a week. The field is used mostly by the Cricket Club. The school also uses it for games and sports. The Hall can be used for anything except religious or political meetings and any damage must be repaired. Dogs must not foul the field and motorbikes are not allowed to be ridden.
